shortdesc.ph: The options for SDK preset voice beautifier effects.

plentry.pd: Turn off voice beautifier effects and use the original voice.

pd.note: This method retrieves the audio flag and only works for local streams. @note Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a male-sounding voice; otherwise, you may experience vocal distortion.
This method retrieves the audio flag and only works for local streams. @note Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a female-sounding voice; otherwise, you may experience vocal distortion.
This method retrieves the audio flag and only works for local streams. @note Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a female-sounding voice; otherwise, you may experience vocal distortion.

ul.li: If you call (), you can beautify the male voice and add the reverberation effect of the singing voice in the small room. @note Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a male-sounding voice; otherwise, you may experience vocal distortion.
If you call (, param1, param2), you can beautify male or female voices and add reverb effects.
